#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll int
#define dd double
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define pb(x) push_back(x)
#define mp(x,y) make_pair(x,y)
#define vi vector<ll>
#define pii pair<ll,ll>
#define vpi vector<pair<ll,ll> >
#define modu 1000000007
ll ar[4123456];
int main()
{
    cin.sync_with_stdio(0);
    cin.tie(0);
    ll t;
    register ll i,j,k,l,m,n,x,y,ans=1;
    cin>>n>>k;
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        cin>>ar[i];
    }
    for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
    {
        if(ar[i]<=(ar[i-1]+k) &&  (ar[i]+k)>=(ar[i-1]))
        {
            ans+=1;
        }
        else break;
    }
    cout<<ans<<endl;
    return 0;
}
